concept.title: FAQ
concept.shortdesc: Some questions often asked by previous renters.

conbody.p: A: Shanks Hall is across the street from McBryde, behind Major Williams.

p.b: Q: Do we have to use the computers in the labs?

conbody.p: A: Not at all! The labs are multipurpose working spaces, intended to be a classroom for all types of English classes.

p.b: Q: Is there anywhere that people could go for a break?

conbody.p: A: Just outside the doors to the labs is the Shanks Atrium, with tables, seats, and charging stations.

p.b: Q: Why is there an ice cream machine in Room 360?

conbody.p: A: These rooms are also used by univeristy classes. That is part of an ongoing project for one of them.
More questions? Check out our Contacts page for direct service.
